name: Dwarven Realms
description:
Dwarven Realms is a fast-paced third-person Action RPG where you play a human in a realm that used to be ruled by dwarves. The dwarven race has been extinct for over 4,000 years by a mysterious evil force led by the sinister lord Archeon. He has now returned, and the only thing stopping him from wiping out the human race is you.

Roam the beautiful continent with over five unique dungeons and ten different zones in an open-world sandbox-style world. Every corner of the land has a unique, different style, with its creatures and beauty. Different adventures await.

The environment is entirely intractable. Every chest or box you encounter along the way is lootable, every iron ore vest is minable, every tree can be chopped down, and every flower can be picked up. These resources will help you craft unique weapons and armors and will aid you as you continue your journey battling the forces of Archeon.


The game has a unique skill tree where you can choose your path and profession in different weapons and combat. You can learn unique abilities and create your unique builds. The game has a unique and complex item-generated system that you can expect from modern RPG games.


Through these systems, the number of items is endless, and each character is different than the other, and each time you play, you find yourself on a unique journey.
